perturbation.original_text: MKOS will have 30-days from receipt of information to determine if they wish to go forward with the technology license. UTEK, after 30 days, shall have the right to present the technology to other clients.
perturbation.changed_text: MKOS will have 30-days from receipt of information to determine if they wish to go forward with the technology license. UTEK, after 60 days, shall have the right to present the technology to other clients.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specifies that UTEK can present the technology to other clients after 30 days. The modified text changes this to 60 days. This creates a contradiction because it is unclear when UTEK can present the technology to other clients, since there is another 30 days mentioned previously.

perturbation.original_text: Either party may terminate this Agreement at any time with 30 days written notice.
perturbation.changed_text: Either party may terminate this Agreement at any time with 60 days written notice.
perturbation.explanation: The original text allows termination with 30 days written notice. The modified text stipulates 60 days. This creates a direct contradiction regarding the required notice period for termination, making the contract ambiguous.

perturbation.original_text: UTEK shall not divulge to others, any trade secret or confidential information, knowledge, or data concerning or pertaining to the business and affairs of MKOS, obtained by UTEK as a result of its engagement hereunder, unless authorized, in writing by MKOS.
perturbation.changed_text: UTEK shall not divulge to others, any trade secret or confidential information, knowledge, or data concerning or pertaining to the business and affairs of MKOS, obtained by UTEK as a result of its engagement hereunder, unless authorized, orally by MKOS.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that authorization must be in writing. The modified text allows oral authorization. This creates a contradiction and makes it unclear whether authorization needs to be written or oral, impacting the enforceability of the confidentiality clause.
